TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DriveInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class DriveInfo Implements ISerializable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DriveInfo extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DriveInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 提供对有关驱动器的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to information on a drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类对驱动器建模，并提供用于查询驱动器信息的方法和属性。This class models a drive and provides methods and properties to query for drive information. 使用 确定可用的驱动器和设备的类型。Use to determine what drives are available, and what type of drives they are. 还可以通过查询来确定驱动器上的容量和可用空间。You can also query to determine the capacity and available free space on the drive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string driveName) cil managed

param.name: driveName
param.span: 有效驱动器路径或驱动器号。

span.span: A valid drive path or drive letter.

param.span: 它可以是从“a”到“z”的大写或小写字母。

span.span: This can be either uppercase or lowercase, 'a' to 'z'.
A null value is not valid.

summary.span: 提供对有关指定驱动器的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to information on the specified drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类可获取有关驱动器的信息。Use this class to obtain information on drives. 驱动器名称必须是从 "a" 到 "z" 的大写或小写字母。The drive name must be either an uppercase or lowercase letter from 'a' to 'z'. 不能使用此方法获取有关驱动器名称 `null` 或使用 UNC (\\ \server\share) 路径的信息。You cannot use this method to obtain information on drive names that are `null` or use UNC (\\\server\share) paths.

exception.span: 驱动器号不能为 。

span.span: The drive letter cannot be .

exception.span: 的第一个字母不能是从“a”到“z”的大写或小写字母。

span.span: The first letter of is not an uppercase or lowercase letter from 'a' to 'z'.
-or-

exception.span: 未引用有效的驱动器。

span.span: does not refer to a valid drive.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableFreeSpace As Long
public: property long AvailableFreeSpace { long get(); };

summary.span: 指示驱动器上的可用空闲空间总量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Indicates the amount of available free space on a drive, in bytes.

value.span: 驱动器上的可用空闲空间量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The amount of free space available on the drive, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示驱动器上的可用空间量。This property indicates the amount of free space available on the drive. 请注意，此数字可能不同于 数字，因为此属性会考虑磁盘配额。Note that this number may be different from the number because this property takes into account disk quotas. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

exception.span: 拒绝访问驱动器信息。

span.span: Access to the drive information is denied.

exception.span: 发生了 I/O 错误（例如，磁盘错误或驱动器未准备好）。

span.span: An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).

span.span: Gets the name of the file system, such as NTFS or FAT32.

value.span: 指定驱动器上文件系统的名称。

span.span: The name of the file system on the specified drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 确定驱动器使用的格式。Use to determine what formatting a drive uses. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

span.span: Access to the drive information is denied.

exception.span: 该驱动器不存在或未映射。

span.span: The drive does not exist or is not mapped.

exception.span: 发生了 I/O 错误（例如，磁盘错误或驱动器未准备好）。

span.span: An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DriveType As DriveType
public: property System::IO::DriveType DriveType { System::IO::DriveType get(); };

summary.span: 获取驱动器类型，如 CD-ROM、可移动、网络或固定。

span.span: Gets the drive type, such as CD-ROM, removable, network, or fixed.

value.span: 指定驱动器类型的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies a drive type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示驱动器是否为以下其中一项： `CDRom` 、 `Fixed` 、 `Network` 、、、 `NoRootDirectory` `Ram` `Removable` 或 `Unknown` 。The property indicates whether a drive is one of the following: `CDRom`, `Fixed`, `Network`, `NoRootDirectory`, `Ram`, `Removable`, or `Unknown`. 枚举中对这些值进行了说明 。These values are described in the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

Public Shared Function GetDrives () As DriveInfo()

summary.span: 检索计算机上的所有逻辑驱动器的驱动器名称。

span.span: Retrieves the drive names of all logical drives on a computer.

returns.span: 类型的数组，表示计算机上的逻辑驱动器。

span.span: An array of type that represents the logical drives on a computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索计算机上的所有逻辑驱动器名称。This method retrieves all logical drive names on a computer. 您可以使用此信息来循环访问数组，并使用其他方法和属性获取有关驱动器的信息 。You can use this information to iterate through the array and obtain information on the drives using other methods and properties. 使用 属性测试驱动器是否已准备就绪，因为在未就绪的驱动器上使用此方法将引发 。Use the property to test whether a drive is ready because using this method on a drive that is not ready will throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

exception.span: 发生了 I/O 错误（例如，磁盘错误或驱动器未准备好）。

span.span: An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).

exception.span: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
File and Stream I/O

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReady As Boolean
public: property bool IsReady { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示驱动器是否已准备好的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a drive is ready.

value.span: 如果驱动器已准备好，则为 ；如果驱动器未准备好，则为 。

span.span: if the drive is ready; if the drive is not ready.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示驱动器是否已准备就绪。 indicates whether a drive is ready. 例如，它指示 CD 是否在 CD 驱动器中，或者可移动存储设备是否准备好进行读/写操作。For example, it indicates whether a CD is in a CD drive or whether a removable storage device is ready for read/write operations. 如果未测试驱动器是否已准备就绪，并且该驱动器未准备就绪，则使用查询驱动器 将引发 。If you do not test whether a drive is ready, and it is not ready, querying the drive using will raise an . 不要依赖 于避免从其他成员（如、和）捕获 异常 。Do not rely on to avoid catching exceptions from other members such as , , and . 在你的代码检查 然后访问其他某个属性的时间之间 (即使在检查) 之后立即进行访问，也可能是驱动器已断开连接或磁盘可能已被删除。Between the time that your code checks and then accesses one of the other properties (even if the access occurs immediately after the check), a drive may have been disconnected or a disk may have been removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

The name of the drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是分配给驱动器的名称，如 C：\或 E： \\ 。This property is the name assigned to the drive, such as C:\ or E:\\. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化程序自动跟踪并序列化对象中包含的任何对象。Any objects included in the object are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示驱动器上的可用空间总量，而不只是当前用户可用的空间。This property indicates the total amount of free space available on the drive, not just what is available to the current user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. summary.span: 获取或设置驱动器的卷标。

span.span: Gets or sets the volume label of a drive.
The volume label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标签长度由操作系统决定。The label length is determined by the operating system. 例如，NTFS 允许卷标长度最长为32个字符。For example, NTFS allows a volume label to be up to 32 characters long. 请注意， `null` 是有效的 。Note that `null` is a valid . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类显示有关当前系统上所有驱动器的信息。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all the drives on the current system.
